rukus.text: Wa Man 'Ahsanu Qawlaan Mimman Da`a 'Ila Allahi Wa `Amila Salihaan Wa Qala 'Innani Mina Al-Muslimina
Wa La Tastawi Al-Hasanatu Wa La As-Sayyi'atu Adfa` Bi-Ati Hiya 'Ahsanu Fa'idha Al-Ladhi Baynaka Wa Baynahu `Adawatun Ka'annahu Wa Liyun Hamimun
Wa Ma Yulaqqaha 'Illa Al-Ladhina Sabaru Wa Ma Yulaqqaha 'Illa Dhu Hazzin `Azimin
Wa 'Imma Yanzaghannaka Mina Ash-Shaytani Nazghun Fasta`idh Billahi 'Innahu Huwa As-Sami`u Al-`Alimu
Wa Min 'Ayatihi Al-Laylu Wa An-Naharu Wa Ash-Shamsu Wa Al-Qamaru La Tasjudu Lilshamsi Wa La Lilqamari Wa Asjudu Lillahi Al-Ladhi Khalaqahunna 'In Kuntum 'Iyahu Ta`buduna
Fa'ini Astakbaru Fa-Al-Ladhina `Inda Rabbika Yusabbihuna Lahu Bil-Layli Wa An-Nahari Wa Hum La Yas'amuna
Wa Min 'Ayatihi 'Annaka Tara Al-'ArÄ‘a Khashi`atan Fa'idha 'Anzalna `Alayha Al-Ma'a Ahtazzat Wa Rabat 'Inna Al-Ladhi 'Ahyaha Lamuhyi Al-Mawta 'Innahu `Ala Kulli Shay'in Qadirun
Inna Al-Ladhina Yulhiduna Fi 'Ayatina La Yakhfawna `Alayna 'Afaman Yulqa Fi An-Nari Khayrun 'Am Man Ya'ti 'Aminaan Yawma Al-Qiyamati A`malu Ma Shi'tum 'Innahu Bima Ta`maluna Basirun
Inna Al-Ladhina Kafaru Bidh-Dhikri Lamma Ja'ahum Wa 'Innahu Lakitabun `Azizun
La Ya'tihi Al-Batilu Min Bayni Yadayhi Wa La Min Khalfihi Tanzilun Min Hakimin Hamidin
Ma Yuqalu Laka 'Illa Ma Qad Qila Lilrrusuli Min Qablika 'Inna Rabbaka Ladhu Maghfiratin Wa Dhu `Iqabin 'Alimin

Wa Law Ja`alnahu Qur'anaan 'A`jamiyaan Laqalu Lawla Fussilat 'Ayatuhu 'A'a`jamiyun Wa `Arabiyun Qul Huwa Lilladhina 'Amanu Hudaan Wa Shifa'un Wa Al-Ladhina La Yu'uminuna Fi 'Adhanihim Waqrun Wa Huwa `Alayhim `Amaan 'Ula'ika Yunadawna Min Makanin Ba`idin
